name: Preschool Program
description: The Preschool program is designed to capture the natural, active curiosity of 3 through 5 year olds. Through enhanced play, the arts, and cultural sensitivity, children learn to embrace their creativity, develop critical thinking skills, build friendships, ultimately creating a positive view in the way that they see themselves. Our classrooms and playgrounds provide the natural setting for building strong bodies and observing the natural world.

howToGetIt: To apply for Private Pay or Subsidized Childcare at either FranDelJA location, please contact us our administrative office, at 415-822-1699.
cost: This is a fee based service
